\0(5촀\0Except you.

(촀\0But don't think that means I expect

\0Whatever you get me

(촀\0Have you started thinking about what

\0(%촀\0And don't wait until the last

There's a festive tree up in the plaza

\0(촀\0It's really starting to feel like
